tool_description: That API provides you can see all oppurtunity products time by time like 12:00-24:00 day by day. And their links and prices etc.
title: Trendyol Opportunity Products

api_list.name: 21-24 Request
api_list.description: It will returns between 21:00 and 24:00 opportunities.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trendyol-opportunity-products.p.rapidapi.com/get/21-24"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trendyol-opportunity-products.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: 12-15 Request
api_list.description: It will be returns that between 12 and 15 opportunities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trendyol-opportunity-products.p.rapidapi.com/get/12-15"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trendyol-opportunity-products.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
